name: ThePirateBay - Night Owl
description: A dark theme for the Pirate Bay that allows the user to customize a link and accent color for a slightly more personalized theme. Enjoy! Please leave me feedback here. It helps me know what you want and what needs to be fixed so I can make my theme better, so please give descriptive feedback. If you like my theme, I would appreciate it if you would comment on and rate it.
additional_info: [1.3] (Aug. 18, 2018) -Now works on "www.thepiratebay" -Images are links once again -New setting: "Download link color" [1.2] (May 4, 2018) -Images converted to base64 (may not be staying) -New default "Link colors" (old are "#40C000", "#80FF00") -"Logo color" default setting switched to "White & gray" [1.1.2] -Fixed footer on "thepiratebay" [1.1.1] (Thank you DevQuantum.) -Removed ads -White & gray logo option [1.1] -Now works on "thepiratebay-proxylist.org" [1.0] (Oct. 4, 2017) -Initial release

discussions.name: Please update to work with pirateproxy by default
Add this code to remove ads and change the logo properly.
